data.name: ArgumentContainsUnitsNotInSource
data.value: Argument cannot contain units not in source location.

data.name: ArgumentNotNullOrVariable
data.value: Argument must be a null reference or a Variables element.

data.name: ArgumentSpecifiesAnimation
data.value: Argument cannot specify {0} with animated image stack.

data.name: ArgumentSpecifiesSingleFrame
data.value: Argument cannot specify {0} with less than two image frames.

data.name: CommandEntityCategory
data.value: {0} command specifies entity “{1}” with invalid category “{2}”.

data.name: CommandEntityDestroy
data.value: {0} command specifies entity “{1}” with cannot be destroyed.

data.name: CommandEntityInvalid
data.value: {0} command specifies entity “{1}” which faction “{2}” does not own.

data.name: CommandEntityNone
data.value: {0} command does not specify any entities.

data.name: CommandEntityPlaced
data.value: {0} command specifies entity “{1}” which is already placed.

data.name: CommandEntityUnplaced
data.value: {0} command specifies entity “{1}” which is not yet placed.

data.name: CommandEntityClassBuild
data.value: {0} command specifies entity class “{1}” which faction “{2}” cannot build.

data.name: CommandEntityClassEmpty
data.value: {0} command specifies empty entity class identifier.

data.name: CommandEntityClassNone
data.value: {0} command does not specify any entity classes.

data.name: CommandFactionConflict
data.value: {0} command specifies faction “{1}” instead of active faction “{2}”.

data.name: CommandFactionNone
data.value: {0} command does not specify a faction.

data.name: CommandInlineInvalid
data.value: {0} command cannot be inlined by another command.

data.name: CommandQueueInvalid
data.value: {0} command cannot be queued by another command.

data.name: CommandQueueNull
data.value: {0} command posted a null reference to Commands queue.

data.name: CommandTargetClass
data.value: {0} command specifies entities of class “{1}” which rejects target site {2}.

data.name: CommandTargetEntities
data.value: {0} command specifies entities that reject target site {1}.

data.name: CommandTargetNone
data.value: {0} command does not specify a target site.

data.name: CommandTextNone
data.value: {0} command does not specify additional text.

data.name: CommandTurnInvalid
data.value: {0} command specifies turn {1} instead of current turn {2}.

data.name: DialogBackgroundNone
data.value:
You must define at least one background terrain, i.e. a terrain class with a background image, before you can add or change map contents.
Use the Images page to define background images, and the Entities page to define terrain classes.

data.name: DialogActiveUnitsNone
data.value: This faction currently owns no units that can still take action.

data.name: DialogAttackPlacedNone
data.value: This faction currently owns no placed units.

data.name: DialogAttackSourceNone
data.value: None of the units in the selected site can perform an attack.

data.name: DialogAttackTargetNone
data.value: None of the units that belong to this faction can attack the selected site.

data.name: DialogBuildAllowedNone
data.value: The current scenario does not allow this faction to build any entities.

data.name: DialogCommandCounters
DialogCommandInvalid
data.value: The command was invalid and could not be executed.

data.name: DialogCommandResume
data.value:
An invalid command was found in saved game file “{0}”.
Choose OK to discard this command and continue. Choose Cancel to abort opening this file.

data.name: DialogComputerError
data.value:
The computer player for this faction was stopped due to an unrecoverable error.
The faction is now controlled by the next local human player.

data.name: DialogComputerStopped
data.value:
The computer player for this faction was stopped as requested.
The faction is now controlled by the next local human player.

data.name: DialogEntityClassMissing
data.value:
The selected entity instance refers to an entity class ID that does not match any of those defined by the Entities section of this scenario.
You cannot edit entity instances without an entity class. Use the Entities page to define a matching entity class.

data.name: DialogEntityDestroy
data.value: Are you sure you want to destroy this entity?

data.name: DialogExplorerFileError
data.value: Windows Explorer was unable to locate the file “{0}” in your Hexkit installation folder.

data.name: DialogExplorerMailError
data.value: Windows Explorer was unable to locate or start your system’s default e-mail client.

data.name: DialogExplorerWebError
data.value: Windows Explorer was unable to locate or start your system’s default web browser.

data.name: DialogEventDefeatGlobal
data.value: All surviving factions perished simultaneously. Everyone is defeated – there are no winners!

data.name: DialogEventVictory
data.value: Congratulations to the winning faction, led to victory by {0}!

data.name: DialogFatalErrorMail
data.value:
Another error occurred while trying to create an e-mail message with attached files.
Choose OK to try a simpler e-mail format without any file attachments that should always succeed.
Choose Cancel to quit the program immediately.

data.name: DialogFatalErrorModified
data.value:
An unrecoverable error has occurred. The program will now terminate. Sorry for the inconvenience.
Detailed error information and current program data, if available, will be saved to the following files:
“{0}” “{1}” “{2}”
No e-mail message will be created since one or more Hexkit assemblies have been modified, compared to the distribution package. Click OK to continue.

data.name: DialogFatalErrorOriginal
data.value:
An unrecoverable error has occurred. The program will now terminate. Sorry for the inconvenience.
Detailed error information and current program data, if available, will be saved to the following files:
“{0}” “{1}” “{2}”
Choose OK to create an e-mail message to the author with these files attached. You may enter additional comments as you wish. Thanks for your support!
Choose Cancel to quit the program without sending an e-mail. The files will be created regardless.

data.name: DialogFatalErrorSave
data.value:
Another error occurred while trying to create one of the error data files.
Click OK to terminate the program.

data.name: DialogFatalErrorSaveMail
data.value:
Another error occurred while trying to create one of the file attachments.
Choose OK to try a simpler e-mail format without any file attachments that should always succeed.
Choose Cancel to quit the program immediately.

data.name: DialogFileCreateError
data.value:
Failed to create file or directory “{0}”.
Make sure you have write permission in the parent directory, and verify that some free space remains on the disk drive or in your file quota.
Hexkit requires this directory to store user-specific data. The program cannot continue to run and will now terminate.

data.name: DialogFileGame
data.value:
The specified file appears to be a Hexkit save game file which cannot be loaded into Hexkit Editor.
“{0}”

data.name: DialogFileInvalid
data.value:
The specified file does not appear to be a valid Hexkit scenario file or save game file.
“{0}”

data.name: DialogFileMissing
data.value:
The specified file could not be found.
“{0}”

data.name: DialogGameUnsaved
data.value: Are you sure you want to close this game without saving?

data.name: DialogIdentifierChange
data.value:
The identifier you are about to change is referenced in {0} places throughout the current scenario.
Do you want to change all of these references to the new identifier?
Choose Yes to confirm, No to change this instance only, or Cancel to abort without any changes.

data.name: DialogIdentifierDelete
data.value:
The identifier you are about to delete is referenced in {0} places throughout the current scenario.
Do you want to delete all of these references?
Choose Yes to confirm, No to delete this instance only, or Cancel to abort without any changes.

data.name: DialogIdentifierDuplicate
data.value:
The identifier you entered already exists in this collection. Identifiers must be unique throughout the scenario.
Please correct your input or cancel the dialog.

data.name: DialogIdentifierMalformed
data.value:
The identifier you entered is not a well-formed NCName according to the XML 1.0 specification.
Well-formed identifiers contain no spaces, and no punctuation other than periods, hyphens, and underscores. Digits are legal but the identifier must start with a letter or underscore.
Please correct your input or cancel the dialog.

data.name: DialogImageFileNone
data.value: You must define at least one image file before you can add or change images.

data.name: DialogImageMissing
data.value: The selected image ID does not match any of those defined by the Images section of this scenario.

data.name: DialogImageNone
data.value:
You must define at least one image before you can add or change classes.
Use the Images page to define images.

data.name: DialogInstanceAnother
data.value:
The current user, {1}, is already running another instance of the {0} application.
To avoid unintentional corruption of user-specific data, each user may only run a single instance at a time.

data.name: DialogMailError
data.value: An error occurred while creating the PBEM message.

data.name: DialogMailErrorMapi
data.value: Your e-mail client reported an error. The operation has been aborted.

data.name: DialogMailInvalid
data.value:
The e-mail address you entered is not valid. Valid addresses are of the form "user@host".
Please correct the entry or cancel the dialog.

data.name: DialogMailInvalidMapi
data.value: Your e-mail client returned an invalid address. Please enter a valid e-mail address manually.

data.name: DialogMapBoundsInvalid
data.value:
The edge movements you entered would result in a map size that is less than one or greater than {0:N0} in either dimension.
Please correct the values or cancel the dialog.

data.name: DialogMoveSourceEmpty
data.value: The selected site does not contain any units that belong to this faction.

data.name: DialogMoveSourceNone
data.value: None of the units in the selected site can move any further.

data.name: DialogOptionsLoadError
data.value:
Failed to load options file “{0}”.
All options that could not be read will assume default values.

data.name: DialogOptionsSaveError
data.value:
Failed to write options file “{0}”.
All unsaved options will be lost when the program terminates.

data.name: DialogPlayerChanged
data.value:
You have assigned a new player to the active faction. Do you want to switch players immediately?
Choose Yes to let {0} take control now. Choose No to let {1} complete this turn.

data.name: DialogPlayerConflict
data.value:
Some factions are assigned to human players in hotseat mode while others are assigned to human players in e-mail mode.
You cannot mix hotseat and e-mail mode in the same game. Please correct either the faction assignment or the properties of the conflicting human players.
Note: If you want to set up an e-mail game with some human players sharing the same computer, simply give those players the same e-mail address.

data.name: DialogPlayerLocal
data.value:
This faction is controlled by player {0} at e-mail address {1}.
This address belongs to the local system.
Choose Yes if this is correct. The player’s turn will begin on this computer.
Choose No if the address belongs to a remote system. A PBEM message will be created and sent to the player.

data.name: DialogPlayerRemote
data.value:
This faction is controlled by player {0} at e-mail address {1}.
This address belongs to a remote system.
Choose Yes if this is correct. A PBEM message will be created and sent to the player.
Choose No if the address belongs to the local system. The player’s turn will begin on this computer.

data.name: DialogPlayerRetry
data.value:
Hexkit failed to create the PBEM message.
Choose OK for another attempt, or Cancel to abort and close the game.
If you cancel now, you can later reload the last autosave file to try again.

data.name: DialogPlayerStart
data.value:
This faction is controlled by player {0} on the local system.
Click OK to start your turn.

data.name: DialogReplayError
data.value: A stored command could not be executed. The interactive replay has been stopped.

data.name: DialogReplayNone
data.value: There are no commands to replay.

data.name: DialogResignFaction
data.value: Are you sure you want to retire this faction from the game?

data.name: DialogScenarioChanged
data.value:
The scenario on which this saved game is based has been changed since the game was saved. This could lead to errors or unpredictable behavior.
Are you sure you want to open this game?

data.name: DialogScenarioSaveError
data.value:
Failed to write scenario description to file “{0}”.
Hexkit Game is not affected by this failure. However, the cause for this error could lead to other (and possibly worse) errors later on.

data.name: DialogSectionUnsaved
data.value:
All data in this section will be lost.
Are you sure you want to continue without saving the current section?

data.name: DialogSectionUnsavedAll
data.value:
All data in ALL sections will be lost.
Are you sure you want to continue without saving the unsaved sections?

data.name: DialogSessionOpenError
data.value: Failed to open saved game file “{0}”.

data.name: DialogSessionSaveError
data.value: Failed to save game to file “{0}”.

data.name: DialogSiteDelete
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete {0} sites that contain customized entity stacks?

data.name: DialogSiteEmpty
data.value: The selected site does not contain any entities owned by this faction.

data.name: DialogSiteUnowned
data.value: This site has no owner. You must select a specific unit owner to place units here.

data.name: DialogSiteUnselected
data.value: No map location is currently selected.

data.name: DialogTargetUnselected
data.value: You must select a valid target site for the command.

data.name: DialogUnitAbilites
data.value:
“A” indicates that the unit can still attack this turn. “M” indicates that the unit can still move this turn. “B” indicates that the owner may build units of this class. “C” indicates that the unit can capture map sites.
A dash indicates that the unit does not have the corresponding ability.
Please refer to the online help for further details.

data.name: DialogUnitAttackInvalid
data.value: The selected combination of units cannot attack the target site.

data.name: DialogUnitUnselected
data.value: You must select one or more units to execute the command.

data.name: DialogVariableDuplicate
data.value:
The variable list already contains the selected value variant for the selected variable ID.
You can only add a single basic value and one modifier value per target for each variable.

data.name: DialogVariableScaleMismatch
data.value:
A value for variable ID “{0}” is not an even multiple of the variable’s display scale, or vice versa.
Choose OK to accept the value regardless. Choose Cancel to return to the dialog.

data.name: DialogVariablesNone
data.value: The current scenario does not define any attributes or resources.

data.name: ErrorEditorOnly
data.value: Hexkit Game or the scenario rule script attempted to perform an operation valid only within Hexkit Editor. Please notify the scenario author.

data.name: ErrorOwnerAreaNone
data.value: Unit placed on site {0} without unit owner.

data.name: ErrorOwnerEffectConflict
data.value: Effect “{0}” is assigned a different Owner than the Site owner.

data.name: ErrorOwnerTerrainConflict
data.value: Terrain “{0}” is assigned a different Owner than the Site owner.

data.name: ErrorOwnerUnitConflict
data.value: Unit “{0}” is assigned a different Owner than other units at the same Site.

data.name: ErrorOwnerUnitNone
data.value: Unit “{0}” is assigned a null Owner.

data.name: ErrorOwnerUpgradeNone
data.value: Upgrade “{0}” is assigned a null Owner.

data.name: ErrorRulesAssembly
data.value: Rule script assembly is a null reference.

data.name: ErrorRulesCompile
data.value: Failed to compile rule script file “{0}”.

data.name: ErrorRulesFactoryCtor
data.value: RulesFactory class has no default constructor.

data.name: ErrorRulesFile
data.value: Rule script file “{0}” has an unrecognized file extension.

data.name: ErrorRulesLoad
data.value: Failed to load rule script from compiled assembly.

data.name: ErrorRulesPathNull
data.value: Attempting to load rule script from an empty path.

data.name: ErrorScenarioTemporary
data.value: Cannot read temporary file as scenario file.

data.name: ErrorSiteEffectNone
data.value: Effect “{0}” is assigned a null Site.

data.name: ErrorSiteTerrainConflict
data.value: Terrain “{0}” is assigned a valid Site with a different Owner.

data.name: ErrorSiteUnitConflict
data.value: Unit “{0}” is assigned a valid Site containing units with a different Owner.

data.name: ErrorSiteUpgradeValid
data.value: Upgrade “{0}” is assigned a valid Site.

data.name: ErrorVariableValue
data.value: Variable “{0}” is assigned an out-of-range value {1}.

data.name: EventDefeatResource
data.value: This faction has insufficient {0} and will be removed from the game.

data.name: EventDefeatSites
data.value: This faction retains too little territory and will be removed from the game.

data.name: EventDefeatTurns
data.value: This faction has exceeded its turn limit and will be removed from the game.

data.name: EventDefeatUnits
data.value: This faction retains too few units and will be removed from the game.

data.name: EventDefeatUnitStrength
data.value: This faction has insufficient unit strength and will be removed from the game.

data.name: EventResigned
data.value: This faction has resigned in despair and will be removed from the game.

data.name: EventUnitsAutoDestroy
data.value: This faction can no longer maintain its entire army. The following units were automatically disbanded:

data.name: EventUnitsKilled
data.value: The following units were destroyed in battle:

data.name: EventVictoryResource
data.value: This faction has amassed enough {0} to win the game!

data.name: EventVictorySites
data.value: This faction has captured enough territory to win the game!

data.name: EventVictorySurvivor
data.value: This faction is the sole survivor as all its enemies have fallen!

data.name: EventVictoryTurns
data.value: This faction has survived long enough to win the game!

data.name: EventVictoryUnits
data.value: This faction has amassed enough units to win the game!

data.name: EventVictoryUnitStrength
data.value: This faction has amassed enough unit strength to win the game!

data.value: Hexkit Games (*.xml.gz;*.xml)|*.xml.gz;*.xml|Hexkit Games, compressed (*.xml.gz)|*.xml.gz|Hexkit Games, uncompressed (*.xml)|*.xml

data.value: Supported Images|*.bmp;*.gif;*.jpg;*.jpeg;*.png;*.tif;*.tiff|BMP Images (*.bmp)|*.bmp|GIF Images (*.gif)|*.gif|JPEG Images (*.jpg;*.jpeg)|*.jpg;*.jpeg|PNG Images (*.png)|*.png|TIFF Images (*.tif;*.tiff)|*.tif;*.tiff

data.name: InfoEntityCategoryEmpty
data.value: The current scenario does not define any entity classes of the selected category.

data.name: InfoEventUnknown
data.value: An event occurred but no message was specified.

data.name: InfoPlayerMail
data.value:
The attached file is a saved game for Hexkit.
Drag & drop the attachment on Hexkit Game, or use the menu command "File: Open" within Hexkit Game to open the attached file.

data.name: InfoPlayerMailFinal
data.value: The game is over. Hexkit Game will announce the winners and let you examine the situation.

data.name: InfoPlayerMailPlay
data.value: The name of the active faction is “{0}”. This faction should be controlled by player {1}.

data.name: InfoVariableCategoryEmpty
data.value: The current scenario does not define any variables of the selected category.

data.value: Saving map contents to Areas file, please wait…

data.value: Synchronizing areas with map display, please wait…

data.value: Executing command… press Escape to stop

data.name: StatusCommandSelection
data.value: Select a highlighted target site or press Escape to abort

data.value: Replaying… press Ctrl+P to pause, Ctrl+I to skip, Escape to stop

data.value: Replay paused… press Ctrl+P to continue, Ctrl+I to skip, Escape to stop

data.name: StatusScenarioSaving
data.value: Saving scenario data to file, please wait…

data.value: {0} tag refers to nonexistent algorithm ID "{1}".

data.value: An error occurred while parsing the XML document.

data.value: An error occurred while validating against the XML schema.

data.value: Frame tag missing for image ID “{0}”.
